title: Hayat Plus
text:
Hayat Plus or Hayat PLUS is a <a href="Bosnia">Bosnia</a>n satellite television channel. It is operated by <a href="Hayat%20TV%20%28Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina%29">Hayat TV</a>. The headquarters of TV channel is located in <a href="Vogo%C5%A1%C4%87a">Vogošća</a> (near <a href="Sarajevo">Sarajevo</a>). The program is produced in <a href="Bosnian%20language">Bosnian language</a> and <a href="television%20program">programming</a> is dedicated to <a href="Bosnian%20diaspora">Bosnian diaspora</a>.
The program is broadcast since 2002 (formerly known as NTV Hayat SAT). The program consists of a variety of reportages about the life of Bosnians in Australia, the United States and Europe and it is made by direct contact with people in the Diaspora. The most significant TV shows from the Hayat TV production are adjusted for people in other time zones, without commercials and interruptions. "Hayat Plus" cooperates with local <a href="Television%20in%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">TV stations</a> in BiH and often broadcast their weekly chronicle.
Hayat Plus is available via <a href="Cable%20television">cable systems</a> throughout the <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a> and <a href="Socialist%20Federal%20Republic%20of%20Yugoslavia">former Yugoslavia</a> (<a href="Balkan">Balkan countries</a>). Hayat Plus is part of special "Hayat TV package" (with Hayat TV, <a href="Hayatovci">Hayatovci</a>, <a href="Hayat%20Music">Hayat Music</a> and <a href="Hayat%20Folk">Hayat Folk</a>). Worldwide channel is available via <a href="Eutelsat">Eutelsat</a> satellite provider.
